name: Puzzle Panic! (Prehistoric)
description:
A game that is a fusion of Tetris attack and Warios Woods and my own twists. So far only marathon mode is available but it shold be enjoyable to try out!

Link to the discord: https://discord.gg/EDyc9z3Z

Press Q to drop a block

Press E to throw a boomerang

Press Tab to Hold the next block in reserve

Press Escape to pause.

Max Difficulty right now is 8, planned to be raised to 30 eventually.

Only available mode is marathon mode. You can not adjust settings or options right now. 

Jump on enemies to defeat them

When jumping, a falling block or close enemy can sometimes cause you to "phase through" the block. this is a known bug i am working on.
